product_name: Baffin Lynx Rain Shoes - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Waterproof, durable, and easy to slip on your feet, the Baffin Lynx rain shoes for women are the perfect solution for running errands in wet and slushy weather. The Baffin Lynx rain shoes for women feature tough, waterproof, polyurethane-coated leather uppers with a toggled drawcord to provide a comfortable, foot-hugging fit. Nylon linings draw moisture away from feet to prevent a clammy feeling. Heel loops help with easy on/off; nonslip, nonmarking rubber outsoles provide excellent traction on varied terrain. Closeout.
short_description: Waterproof, durable, and easy to slip on your feet, the Baffin Lynx rain shoes for women are the perfect solution for running errands in wet and slushy weather.
